this training course Whether tailored courses based on our existing content or bespoke courses designed just for you, what really matters is to make sure that what we do together meets your requirements. 1.Tell us your requirements: If you don’t have the time to give us an in-depth account of your needs, we can also help you with this. 2.We set up a purpose-built team: With a project officer, a technical adviser and a trainer/facilitator 3.Together, you fine tune the requirement: Understanding your issues better in order to re-assess the requirements and establish the target audience (headquarters, field, international or national teams, partners). 4.We establish together: a project to suit your requirements: we adapt existing courses or create new content. 5.We establish together: post-training support: we help each participant put the skills they have learnt into practice and assess the impact of the solution on your teams. 6.Select: The place and time, the language, the format (on-site, online through our learning platform or a blended-approach).
